00033                 template<class Decoder>
00034                 void registerDecoder(CodecID id)
00035                 {
00036                     const DecoderCreatorPtr decoder_creator(new NewCreator<Decoder>());
00037                     registerDecoderImpl(id, decoder_creator);
00038                 }
00039 
00048                 template<class CreatorImpl>
00049                 void registerDecoder(CodecID id, CreatorImpl creator)
00050                 {
00051                     //COREDATA_PRECONDITION(creator, "creator cannot be NULL");
00052                     const DecoderCreatorPtr decoder_creator(new CreatorWrapper<CreatorImpl>(creator));
00053                     registerDecoderImpl(id, decoder_creator);
00054                 }

00072                 struct SM_COREDATA_API Creator
00073                 {
00074                     virtual SerializableCompressorDecoder* create() COREDATA_PURE_METHOD;
00075                     virtual ~Creator();
00076                 };
00077                 typedef boost::shared_ptr<Creator> DecoderCreatorPtr;
00078 
00079                 void registerDecoderImpl(CodecID id, const DecoderCreatorPtr& creator);
00080 
00081                 template<class Decoder>
00082                 struct NewCreator : Creator
00083                 {
00084                     Decoder* create() 
00085                     {                 
00086                         return new Decoder(); 
00087                     }
00088                 };
00089 
00090                 template<class CreatorImpl>
00091                 struct CreatorWrapper : Creator
00092                 {
00093                     CreatorWrapper(CreatorImpl impl) : _impl(impl) {}
00094                     SerializableCompressorDecoder* create()
00095                     {
00096                         return _impl();
00097                     }
00098                     CreatorImpl _impl;
00099                 };
